channel.title: How do you add objects with client.java?
channel.description: Okay I tried adding some iron ore rocks to my objects.java. Nothing worked how do I add it to my client.java? can someone show the coding or where it should be at.

item.title: How do you add objects with client.java?
item.dc:creator: @Torax Torax
item.description:
@Torax wrote:

Okay this is what mine says -

}

public void AddGlobalObject(int objectX, int objectY, int NewObjectID,
		int Face, int ObjectType) {
	// for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
	// Linux (java 1.4.2-compatible) change - Knight's Realm
	for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
		if (p != null) {
			client person = (client) p;

			if (person.playerName != null) {
				if (person.distanceToPoint(objectX, objectY) <= 60) {
					person.ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, NewObjectID,
							Face, ObjectType);
				}
			}
		}

And then there is another one a little ways below that, it says -

}

public void addObject(int objectX, int objectY, int NewObjectID, int Face) {
	outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(60);
	outStream.writeByte(objectY - (mapRegionY * 8));
	outStream.writeByteC(objectX - (mapRegionX * 8));

	/* CREATE OBJECT */
	if (NewObjectID > -1) {
		outStream.writeByte(151);
		outStream.writeByteS(0);
		outStream.writeWordBigEndian(NewObjectID);
		outStream.writeByteA(Face); // 0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3
		// = SOUTH
	}
	outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord();
}

Which one do I use? And how do I use it?

Read full topic
